title: Friendship
verses: Proverbs 17:17 (WEB) — “A friend loves at all times.”
Ecclesiastes 4:9–10 (WEB) — “Two are better than one… if they fall, one will lift up his fellow.”
Proverbs 27:9 (WEB) — “The sweetness of a man’s friend… earnest counsel.”
John 15:13 (WEB) — “Greater love has no one than this…”
body: Good friends are a gift and a responsibility. Show up, speak truth in love, and keep confidences. Choose friends who help you follow Jesus.
prayer: Lord, shape me into a faithful friend. Help me encourage, protect, and build others up in love. Amen.
